item.summary: camel-spring-boot - XML example logs Camel is started many times

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
https://github.com/apache/camel-spring-boot-examples/tree/main/xml-import

and then run

mvn spring-boot:run

It may be related to SB 2.5.0 upgrade where SB is changed. I think this example is because it uses that xml import annotation, that maybe causes spring context refresh events to trigger many times or something.

Okay we end up creating multiple spring camel context object instance which is the real bug due to spring boot emits a refresh even while already creating spring camel context object instance, so a new instance is created,
